_sText:
Map created by L4D Hunter

----------------------------------------

This is my first map for Source engine(first two were for goldscr)

It took me over 2 months to finish

----------------------------------------

Extract to *steam folder*\steamapps\*username*\counter-strike source\

----------------------------------------

The cs_abb_city_bots has buyzones at starts(so bots can buy), cs_abb_city has buyzones only in gunshops.

This city is was abbondoned, but some Terrorists took some hostages there, and put them into jail.
----------------------------------------
This map has 7 secrets.

One is needed to get to the second

Well one of them is quite hard to find.
----------------------------------------

Please try in game before assessing!
